statements: SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT note, comment FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, bookmark FROM user_content WHERE bookmark = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 3 AND bookmark = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, note FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, note, comment, bookmark FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE note LIKE '%important%';
SELECT user_id, note FROM user_content WHERE bookmark = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, note FROM user_content WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY note ASC;
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM user_content WHERE bookmark = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM notes;
SELECT note_text, created_at, user_id FROM notes;
SELECT note_id, user_id, created_at, note_text FROM notes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT note_text FROM notes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at;
SELECT * FROM notes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT note_text, created_at FROM notes WHERE note_id = 5;
SELECT note_text, comment_text FROM notes INNER JOIN comments ON notes.note_id = comments.note_id;
SELECT user_id, count(*) FROM notes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, note_text FROM notes WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM notes;
SELECT content FROM notes WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM notes WHERE course_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content, created_at FROM notes WHERE user_id = 3 AND course_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM notes WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT note_id, content, created_at FROM notes WHERE course_id = 456 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments JOIN notes ON comments.note_id = notes.note_id WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT notes.note_id, notes.content, comments.comment_text FROM notes JOIN comments ON notes.note_id = comments.note_id WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM bookmarks WHERE note_id = 321 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM notes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content, created_at FROM notes WHERE note_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM bookmarks GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM notes ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content, created_at FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT notes.note_id, notes.content, comments.content AS comment_content FROM notes JOIN comments ON notes.note_id = comments.note_id ORDER BY notes.note_id ASC;

SELECT users.username, notes.content, bookmarks.created_at FROM users JOIN bookmarks ON users.user_id = bookmarks.user_id JOIN notes ON bookmarks.note_id = notes.note_id ORDER BY bookmarks.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM notes;
SELECT note_content, created_at FROM notes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS note_count FROM notes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM notes WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(note_id) AS avg_note_id FROM notes GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_note_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM notes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT note_id, note_content FROM notes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, notes.note_content FROM users INNER JOIN notes ON users.user_id = notes.user_id;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE comment_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT users.username, notes.note_content, comments.comment_content FROM users, notes, comments WHERE users.user_id = notes.user_id AND notes.note_id = comments.note_id;
